mapper.select: SELECT commopenid,sum(amount) as amount,sum(bonus) as bonus,sum(comm) as comm FROM OrderInfo where status=${status} group by commopenid ORDER by openid desc
SELECT commopenid,sum(amount) as amount,sum(bonus) as bonus,sum(comm) as comm,status FROM OrderInfo where commopenid=#{commopenid} group by commopenid,status
mapper.update: update OrderInfo set status=1 where commopenid=#{commopenid} and status=0
update OrderInfo set status=2 where commopenid=#{commopenid} and status=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OrderInfo(openid, amount, bonus,commopenid,comm,timeend) VALUE (#{openid},#{amount},#{bonus},#{commopenid},#{comm},#{timeend})
